revised_title: On the Decennial Inequality in Solar-Diurnal and Lunar-Diurnal Magnetic Variations
tldr: The author examines the existence of the decennial inequality in solar-diurnal and lunar-diurnal magnetic variations using Hobarton's magnetic observations. The study confirms the existence of the decennial period in solar-diurnal variations and its non-existence in lunar-diurnal variations.
